One for Fun

About Us

One For Fun is a leading wholesaler and distributor of toys, games, gadgets and more, for both the UK and international markets. We supply a range of products from our house brands HGL, Tobar, and Ozbozz to leading licensed distribution brands such as Maisto & Bburago and Dreambeams We are run by an experienced professional management team with extensive market knowledge and a passion for what we do. With over 45 years of experience within the industry, we have seen many changes and updates to toy safety, which as a company we take very seriously and currently comply with all UK and EU toy safety legislation.


Our Mission

We pride ourselves in supplying good quality, innovative and safe products. We want children and adults alike to have fun and enjoy our products. They should not have to consider safety when it comes to toys, therefore our dedicated compliance team are here to take that worry away. At One For Fun, products go through a long assessment and testing process and are not launched until we are sure that they are safe.
